Reviews.Title: Cheap piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Kedrigern
Reviews.Content: Cheap camera with expected results.  I use these cameras in crawl spaces of houses and other dirty environments so I buy cheap and throw away about 4-5 each year after they are ruined by dirt and water.  I have had 1 megapixel cameras take better photos.  The flash is very slow to recover.  View scree is dim and very difficult to see outdoors.  If you want cheap and disposable as I need for my work, it is a good buy.  Otherwise buy another brand.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Gift
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for a friend.  He said he love it and the price was perfect.  I'm received great photo of his ranch and family

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Carolina Costales
Reviews.Content: The camera is good, buy it for a child and has resisted treatment, its resolution is not as good but for young children is enough

Reviews.Title: Good starter camera
Reviews.Author: Sushmita G Vijayan
Reviews.Content: A perfect starter camera for my son. Not so expensive that I worry about him breaking it, but a "real" camera to get him started with photography.

Reviews.Title: You get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: Pinky
Reviews.Content: This camera is okay; You get your money's worth. I'm not disappointed, but I'm not jumping for joy either. Also, it doesn't really come with instructions, so you will have to download them online. All in all, you get a cheap camera for a cheap price.

Reviews.Title: vivicam
Reviews.Author: william murray
Reviews.Content: i like product i will ntry to and get arother one very soon thank you once again this very good product and and like very much yes very good  thank you once again mr, murray

Reviews.Title: Really BAD video and picture quality!
Reviews.Author: Sexy Phone Girls
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this product. I bought this camera because years ago I had a Vivitar camera. That camera had less than half of the mega pixels that this camera (supposedly) has. The pictures are washed out if you use the flash no matter what, the video is HORRIBLY grainy! My last vivitar camera with half the mega pixels had WAY better video and picture quality. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA IF YOU LIKE QUALITY VIDEO'S AND PICTURES!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
7.1 Megapixel CCD
4x Digital Zoom
1.8" LCD Screen
AntiShake Technology
HD Video Mode
ProductInfo.Name: ViviCam 7022 7.1 Megapixel Compact Camera-7.45 mm - Graphite
